fields.name: developer-agreement
fields.title: Developer agreement
fields.description: A unique identifier for the developer agreement

fields.name: developer-agreement-type
fields.title: Developer agreement type
fields.description: The type of developer contribution, from list maintained by MHCLG

fields.name: organisation
fields.title: Organisation
fields.description: A unique identifier for each organisation, e.g. local-authority:DAC

fields.name: entry-date
fields.title: Entry date
fields.description: The date that the record was created

fields.name: start-date
fields.title: Start date
fields.description: The date on which the entry comes into effect

fields.name: end-date
fields.title: End date
fields.description: The date on which the entry is not longer in effect

fields.name: planning-application
fields.title: Planning application
fields.description: A unique identifier for the planning application (taken from the planning portal)

fields.name: document-url
fields.title: Document URL
fields.description: A persistent URL that points to the specific agreement document

fields.name: developer-agreement-contribution
fields.title: Developer agreement contribution
fields.description: A unique identifier for the developer agreement contribution

fields.name: developer-agreement
fields.title: Developer agreement
fields.description: A unique identifier for the developer agreement

fields.name: developer-contribution-purpose
fields.title: Developer contribution purpose
fields.description: A unique ID for the contribution category, from list maintained by MHCLG

fields.name: amount
fields.title: Amount
fields.description: The agreed contribution amount

fields.title: Entry date
fields.description: The date that the record was created

fields.name: start-date
fields.title: Start date
fields.description: The date on which the entry comes into effect

fields.name: end-date
fields.title: End date
fields.description: The date on which the entry is not longer in effect

fields.name: developer-agreement-transaction
fields.title: Developer agreement transaction
fields.description: A unique identifier for the developer agreement transaction

fields.name: developer-agreement-contribution
fields.title: Developer agreement contribution
fields.description: A unique identifier for the developer agreement contribution

fields.name: amount
fields.title: Amount
fields.description: The amount received from a developer for part/full payment of a contribution. Or the amount spent by a planning authority.A +ve value is money coming in; and a -ve value is money spent

fields.name: entry-date
fields.title: Entry date
fields.description: The date that the record was created

fields.name: start-date
fields.title: Start date
fields.description: The date on which the entry comes into effect

fields.name: end-date
fields.title: End date
fields.description: The date on which the entry is not longer in effect
